text: C. M. Chang (born Chongshen Mongkosungkum Chang; 1 April 1942 - 12 October 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Nationalist Democratic Progressive Party. He was born in Tuensang, Nagaland. He was a member of the Lok Sabha between 2009 and 2014. He also was a member of the Nagaland Legislative Assembly between 2013 until his death. Chang died on 12 October 2020 at a hospital in Kohima, Nagaland from COVID-19 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Indian Christians Category:Nagaland
title: C. M. Chang
